mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT courses_code, professor, trainee, subject_code, score FROM subject JOIN users ON professor = users.email OR trainee = users.email WHERE users.email = #{professor} OR users.email = #{trainee} ) PIVOT ( MAX(score) FOR subject_code IN (10 AS javaScore, 20 AS sqlScore) ) ORDER BY courses_code, professor, trainee

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT courses_code, professor, trainee, subject_code, score FROM subject WHERE trainee = #{trainee} ) PIVOT ( MAX(score) FOR subject_code IN (10 AS javaScore, 20 AS sqlScore) ) ORDER BY courses_code, professor, trainee
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET subject_code = #{subjectCode}, courses_code = #{courseCode}, professor = #{professor}, trainee = #{trainee}, score = #{score} WHERE subject_code = #{subjectCode} AND courses_code = #{coursesCode} AND trainee = #{trainee};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject ( subject_code, courses_code, professor, trainee, score ) VALUES ( #{subjectCode}, #{coursesCode}, #{professor}, #{trainee}, #{score} )
